content: **lil wash cloth** this is a bath mitt/face cloth/wash cloth that is designed to fit over 4 fingers i use it to wash my face and take off my make up combined with a cleansing oil it removes my waterproof mascara better than any cloth i ve tried before i know i m biased but i m truly not making this up folks the texture is dense and soft and feels really nice on the face this pattern uses less than one 50g skein of cotton aran yarn so you ll have some leftover yarn to make a little soap saver tag me on ig @ginger_hook if you decide to make one
